Title: Relates to hospital compliance with federal hospital price transparency law and rules
Summary: Prohibits hospitals from accessing general hospital indigent care pool funds where they are not in compliance with federal hospital price transparency law and rules; requires DOH reporting; authorizes the commissioner of health to allow such facility continued access to the fund under certain conditions.
LawCode: Amd ยง2805, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to hospital compliance with federal hospital price transparency law and rules
